string-array.name: Social_Media_array_subtitle
string-array.item: A social media platform for sharing photos, videos and stories. Offering features like filters, reels and direct messaging. It’s widely used for personal branding and marketing.
A professional networking platform that connects job seekers, employers and professionals. It focuses on career development, industry news and business connections.
A messaging app by Meta for instant text, voice and video communication. It integrates with Facebook for seamless connectivity.
A multimedia messaging app known for its disappearing messages, fun filters and Stories feature. It’s popular for casual social interactions.
A cloud-based messaging app emphasizing speed and security. Offering features like large group chats, file sharing and bots.
A text-based conversation app by Meta, designed for quick sharing of updates and participating in public discussions, often linked with Instagram.
A microblogging platform for real-time updates, news and conversations. Users share opinions and news in short posts called tweets.
A widely used messaging app for text, voice and video communication. It also supports group chats and end-to-end encryption.
A video-sharing platform where users upload, watch and interact with video content. It hosts diverse content, from tutorials to entertainment.
